name: Burger Bar
technologies: HTML, CSS, Handlebars, JavaScript, Node.js, Express, SQL, Sequelize

name: Gif Generator
description: Used giphy.com API to make ajax calls then receive and manipulate JSON data.

name: Crystal Collector

name: Hangman
technologies: Used vanilla JavaScript to choose a random string in an array and compare user guessed letters to letters in the chosen string
